Changelog
=========

0.2.4 (2011-02-04)
------------------
- ORDER_DESCRIPTION is now fetched from specified field values.
- Custome cancel message field is added.

0.1.1 (2011-02-04)
------------------
- Added mailer function to the adapter.

0.0.9 (2011-01-31)
------------------
- Initial release
- Tested with Products.PloneFormGen-1.2.7 on Plone-2.5.5 and Plone-3.1.7.
